"Agregar Habilidades To Your Fav. Items!:
"Arks these days are so reckless! They're
not affixing special habilidades on their
armor. Such neglect can only be out of
ignorance.
OK, listen up! You can affix special
habilidades to your weapons and armor! The
proper affixes can turn the tide in battle!
You'll thank me when you see your
efficiency soar.
Personally, my favorite special habilidad is..."
"武器やユニットに特殊能力を追加する"
